page.title: 17A Bracknell Child's Day
page.content: I am eleven and in{Primary School.} This is my average weekday lifestyle.I get up at 8.00 and eat my breakfast, which is a bowl of Frosties.I dress in my{uniform}of cotton underwear, woolen red jumper with the school shield on, I also wear my grey skirt which has three pleats.Then I have a wash.I use pure soap.I brush my teeth as well.I use Colgate Blue Minty Gel.At school we have swimming or P.E.After play we do our Domesday Project and then it is time for lunch.I have beefburger,chips and a packet of crisps.After lunch we do Maths,English or prepare our class Assembly and go home at 15.20. At home I watch "Coronation Street" then "Roll Over Beethoven".At 20.30 I go to my room and do some project work for an hour then I go to bed and sleep.My school is Wildridings Junior School,my teacher is Mrs Baylis.
